fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / painting the wall
fields.Condition: CheckItem("cindys_brush")  and  CheckItem("fuel_canister_rcm")  and  Variable["TASK.add_even_more_beauty_to_the_wall"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.add_even_more_beauty_to_the_wall_done"] == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But why? We work twelve-hour shift..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But why? We work twelve-hour shifts. We get shot at, spat on..."

fields.Title: You: ""THIS IS REALLY A MIRROR""
fields.Dialogue Text: "THIS IS REALLY A MIRROR"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmh..." Just a hum. No reply."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmh..." Just a hum. No reply.

fields.Title: You: ""But what do we work on? KEEPING EV..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But what do we work on? KEEPING EVERYTHING THE WAY IT IS."

fields.Title: You: "Keep it to yourself."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep it to yourself.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises his eyebrows,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant raises his eyebrows, then sighs.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "You've spoken. The wall will now si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've spoken. The wall will now silently repeat the message. For a decade or so, until the sea air degrades the paint, adding another layer of *detritus* to the city.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah -- fuck us.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah -- fuck us."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But we *are* the police...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But we *are* the police..."

fields.Title: You: ""NO PARKING""
fields.Dialogue Text: "NO PARKING"

fields.Title: You: "Let the wall remain blank. For now...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let the wall remain blank. For now. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "You've spoken. The wall will now si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've spoken. The wall will now silently repeat the message. For a decade or so, until the sea air degrades the paint, adding another layer of *detritus* to the city.

fields.Title: You: ""I LOVE YOU CUNO""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I LOVE YOU CUNO"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Hah! Maybe there's a *reason* for t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hah! Maybe there's a *reason* for that!

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "You've spoken. The wall will now si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've spoken. The wall will now silently repeat the message -- for a decade or so, until the sea air degrades the paint.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The paintbrush in your hand is like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The paintbrush in your hand is like a loaded revolver. What will it be, desperado? Quite a few things come to mind...

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The wall towers over you with its i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The wall towers over you with its indelible message.

fields.Title: You: ""SOMETHING BEAUTIFUL IS GOING TO HA..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "SOMETHING BEAUTIFUL IS GOING TO HAPPEN"

fields.Title: You: ""MOTHER OF ALL WALLS""
fields.Dialogue Text: "MOTHER OF ALL WALLS"

fields.Title: You: "(Draw a 3,500 year old pictogram of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Draw a 3,500 year old pictogram of a human being.)

fields.Title: You: ""RENE LIVES!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "RENE LIVES!"

fields.Title: You: ""FUCK THE POLICE""
fields.Dialogue Text: "FUCK THE POLICE"

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, you're right. Is it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, you're right. Is it too late to change it?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Paintbrush -- check, heavy fuel oil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Paintbrush -- check, heavy fuel oil -- check... Now the only thing left to do is paint the wall.

fields.Title: You: ""WHAT SHADOW LIES THERE, BENEATH TH..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "WHAT SHADOW LIES THERE, BENEATH THE BRIGHT GLEAM"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at the wall in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks at the wall in dismay:

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very poetic." The lieutenant nods..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very poetic." The lieutenant nods in appreciation -- it doesn't sound sincere. "Real poetry. Should we return to our murder investigation? I hear there's a really *bad* one we're supposed to solve."
